review: Great even if the only thing it's used for is game playing!
author: ajmehta

review: Purchased to stream Major league Baseball.  Prior to the fire stick I had a laptop sitting in my floor with an HDMI cable running to my TV and I wanted to clean it up.  Plugged in the Fire Stick and the games were choppy.  Download speeds are too slow.  So bad I had to unplug and go back to the laptop.  I'll have to do some research on download speeds for comparable products.
author: Kenneth Crowe

review: i just wish i have prime, that a perfect cable replacement
author: Tran Mitch Pham

review: Great entry level device on the way to "cutting the cord" with cable. Useful apps. I do wish the Prime movie list was larger. Prime music through the TV sound bar is a lifesaver in the room we have the Fire TV Stick set up.
author: Amazon Customer

review: love it! easy to set up and easy to use, And my favorite no commercials!!!!!
author: Lisa Scruby

review: Really, really not happy with this product. It's choppy, poorly designed, and every corner tries to trick you into spending money.
author: Susan Feigenbaum "susoix"
